Class TeamManagerTestStudent

  • java.lang.Object
    • TeamManagerTestStudent

  • public class TeamManagerTestStudent
extends java.lang.Object
    This JUnit test creates an object of the Team class in order to test its methods. These tests are in addition to the ones performed by the supplied JUnit test

      • testAddPlayer

        public void testAddPlayer()
        Tests the addPlayer method Test: 1. Add an additional forward 2. Add another forward Determines if the correct number of forwards is tracked 3. Add an additional center Determines if the correct number of centers is tracked 4. Add an additional guard 5. Add another guard Determines if the correct number of total players is tracked

      • testGetNumPlayers

        public void testGetNumPlayers()
        Tests the getNumPlayers method Test: 1. Check if the current number of players is 3 2. Add a player and check if the current number of players is 4 3. Add another player and check if the current number of players is 5

      • testGetNumTeams

        public void testGetNumTeams()
        Tests the getNumTeams method Test: 1. Check that the current number of teams is 4 - due to other objects created during tests 2. Create a new Team object and test that the number of teams is 5

      • testPrintTeam

        public void testPrintTeam()
        Test the printTeam method Test: 1. Check that the correct String is being returned 2. Add a new player and check that the correct String is being returned again

      • testToString

        public void testToString()
        Test the toString method Test: 1. Check that the correct String is being returned 2. Add a new player and check that the correct String is being returned again
